name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Site Reliability Engineer with 13+ years of experience expertly managing distributed systems, container orchestration, and automation. Proficient in **GitOps**, **Kubernetes**, **Terraform**, and **AWS**, utilizing tools such as **Prometheus**, **Grafana**, and **ELK** for observability. Skilled in implementing CI/CD practices and leveraging **ArgoCD** for deployment automation. Strong background in **Python**, with additional experience in **Java**, **C++**, and **Go**.

Successfully constructed and scaled high-performance applications in compliance-driven sectors, ensuring adherence to security standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS. Rich experience in developing microservices and event-driven architectures while fostering efficient communication across teams. Passionate about leveraging advanced strategies in DevOps and MLOps to improve system reliability and performance.
